job_title: in Virginia Beach, VA
pros: Very professional organization that rewards hard work.  Beautiful location on the Chesapeake Bay. Team atmosphere in tackling problems.  Dedication to providing quality care and services for residents.  Financial resources to complete tasks properly.  Competitive salary and benefit packages for the location.
cons: Parking can be difficult at times.  Community is so large that all employees don't know each other.  Certain senior residents can sometimes be difficult.  Sad when a beloved resident passes away.

cons: Working for the residence and patrons there was one of the best highlights of my life actually. With over 500 employees you will have issues with the employees. Also the supervisors weren't the best

review_title: Glad to  be part of the team
